sc.fiji.snt.analysis

Class TreeStatistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.scijava.AbstractContextual
      • org.scijava.command.ContextCommand
        • sc.fiji.snt.analysis.TreeAnalyzer
          • sc.fiji.snt.analysis.TreeStatistics
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, org.scijava.Cancelable, org.scijava.command.Command, org.scijava.Contextual, org.scijava.plugin.SciJavaPlugin

    public class TreeStatistics
extends TreeAnalyzer
    Computes summary and descriptive statistics from univariate properties of a Tree.
    Author:
    Tiago Ferreira

      • getHistogram

        public org.jfree.chart.ChartFrame getHistogram(java.lang.String measurement)
        Gets the relative frequencies histogram for a univariate measurement. The number of bins is determined using the Freedman-Diaconis rule.
        Parameters:
        measurement - the measurement (TreeAnalyzer.N_NODES, TreeAnalyzer.NODE_RADIUS, etc.)
        Returns:
        the frame holding the histogram
